welcome.title: Welcome to Excelendar
welcome.description: Import your Outlook calendar into Excel to view, analyze, and bulk-edit events. Export changes back to Outlook with one click.

taskpane.title: Excelendar Calendar Sync
taskpane.description: Import and export calendar events between Excel and Outlook
taskpane.incrementalSyncReady: Incremental sync ready after full import
taskpane.endDateAfterStartDate: End date must be after start date
taskpane.sessionExpiredMessage: Your session may have timed out. Click the button below to reconnect.

status.officeJsNotAvailable: Office.js not available - running in browser mode
status.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to access calendar features
status.accountMismatch: Account mismatch: You must sign in with {officeAccount} (your Office account), but you signed in with {signedInAccount}. Please try again.
status.previousCalendarNotAvailable: Previously associated calendar no longer available

license.notFound: No valid usage rights found. Contact your admin or purchase from Microsoft Marketplace.
license.personalAccountMessage: Personal Microsoft account users need a subscription from excelendar.com

import.selectCalendar: Please select a calendar to import from
import.selectCalendarChanges: Please select a calendar to import changes from
import.licenseRequired: Calendar sync requires a valid license. Please purchase a subscription.
import.noSyncToken: No sync token found. Please perform a full import first.
import.noChangesFound: No changes found since last sync
import.syncTokenExpired: Sync token expired. Please perform a full import to reset sync.
import.dateRangeIncomplete: Date range settings are incomplete. Please configure import settings.
import.authExpired: Authentication expired. Please sign in again.

export.selectCalendar: Please select a calendar to export to
export.licenseRequired: Calendar export requires a valid license. Please purchase a subscription.
export.successRecurring: Export successful: Recurring events processed, showing occurrences
export.partialSuccessWithOccurrences: {count} operations successful ({created} created, {updated} updated, {deleted} deleted) - showing occurrences
export.noEventsToExport: No events to export: enable update/delete checkboxes
export.authExpired: Authentication expired. Please sign in again.
export.failedImportOccurrences: Export successful, but failed to import occurrences: {error}

settings.title: Settings
settings.taskpaneLanguageHelp: Language for buttons, menus, and status messages
settings.sheetLanguageHelp: Language for Excel column headers (shared with collaborators)
settings.sheetDisplayTimezoneHelp: Timezone used to display event dates and times in Display columns
settings.mailboxTimezoneChangeBehaviorHelp: Choose how the add-in should respond when your Outlook mailbox timezone changes
settings.clearRowColorsHelp: When enabled, status colors are cleared on every operation. When disabled, colors remain visible.
settings.preferEventDateTimeHelp: When enabled, Event columns (original timezone) are used as the source of truth at export time. When disabled (default), Display columns (your timezone) are used and synced to Event columns.
settings.preferEventDateTimeModalDescription: Would you like to update the visibility of date/time columns in this sheet?
settings.preferEventDateTimeModalShowEvent: Event columns (original timezone) will be shown and Display columns (your timezone) will be hidden.
settings.preferEventDateTimeModalShowDisplay: Display columns (your timezone) will be shown and Event columns (original timezone) will be hidden.
settings.ignoreTimezoneMismatchHelp: When enabled, the timezone mismatch warning will not appear for this sheet, allowing it to keep a different timezone from your mailbox.
settings.ignoreTimezoneMismatchDisabledHint: This setting has no effect when "Never Ask or Update" is selected below.
settings.keepDeletedEventDetailsHelp: When enabled (default), deleted events retain the title (with strikethrough) and start date for reference. When disabled, deleted rows are completely cleared.
settings.useLayoutForNewImport: Use Saved Layout for New Import
settings.useLayoutForNewImportHelp: When enabled, saved layout is automatically applied to first-time imports
settings.rowHeightHelp: Default row height for data rows in the worksheet
settings.refreshDateTimeFormatsHelp: Re-applies date/time formats based on your current Excel locale
settings.removeDeletedRowsHelp: Permanently removes rows that don't have a Link (event ID)
settings.pleaseWait: Please wait, do not interact with the sheet
settings.columnSettingsChanged: Column settings changed. Re-import calendar to see new columns.
settings.importedColumnData: Successfully imported data for new columns
settings.columnsAddedEmpty: New columns added without importing data

messages.reImportPrompt: Column settings changed. Re-import calendar to see new columns?
messages.personalAccountNotSupported: Personal Microsoft accounts are not supported. Please use a work or school account with Exchange Online.

modal.columnsAddedSingular: 1 new column has been added to your sheet
modal.columnsAddedPlural: {count} new columns have been added to your sheet
modal.importPromptSingular: Would you like to import existing data from Outlook for this column? If you leave it empty, any existing data in Outlook will be overwritten on the next export.
modal.importPromptPlural: Would you like to import existing data from Outlook for these columns? If you leave them empty, any existing data in Outlook will be overwritten on the next export.

timezoneChangeModal.title: Timezone Mismatch
timezoneChangeModal.description: Your sheet display timezone differs from your mailbox timezone
timezoneChangeModal.updatePrompt: Would you like to update the sheet display timezone to match your mailbox timezone? This will affect how event dates and times are displayed in the Display columns.
timezoneChangeModal.dontAskThisSheet: Don't ask again for this sheet
timezoneChangeModal.rememberChoiceHint: This sheet will be allowed to keep a different timezone from your mailbox.

columnMetadata.eventIdColumnNotFound: Event ID column not found - cannot populate columns
columnMetadata.successfullyPopulatedColumns: Successfully populated columns with Outlook data

export.noEventsToExport: No events to export: enable update/delete checkboxes
export.exportOnlyInExcel: Export can only be performed within Excel
export.validationFailed: Excel validation failed: {count} cell validation errors
export.missingEventIdForDelete: Row {row}: Missing Event ID for delete operation
export.startTimeAfterEndTime: Row {row}: Start time cannot be after end time (Start: {start}, End: {end})

incremental.eventIdColumnNotFound: Event ID column not found - cannot process {operation}
incremental.eventNotFoundForUpdate: Event {eventId} not found in worksheet for update
incremental.failedToConvertEvent: Failed to convert event {eventId} to Excel format: {error}
incremental.missingEventIdColumn: Worksheet is missing Event ID column required for incremental updates

errors.eventNotFound: Event not found - it may have been deleted or moved
errors.calendarNotFound: Calendar not found - it may have been deleted or you no longer have access
errors.authExpired: Authentication expired - please sign in again
errors.rateLimitExceeded: API rate limit exceeded - please try again in a few minutes
errors.networkError: Network connection error - please check your internet connection
errors.initCalendarViewDeltaFailed: Failed to initialize calendarView delta token: {error}
errors.batchMappingError: Batch server mapping error: Response ID {id} could not be matched to original operation
errors.batchProcessingError: Batch processing error: Could not find operation for index {index}

status.noRRuleFound: No RRule found in selected row
status.officeNotAvailable: Office.js not available - running in preview mode
status.insertFailed: Failed to insert RRule - please check cell selection
status.noRRuleInSelection: No RRule found in selected cells
status.officeNotAvailableInsert: Office.js not available - cannot insert RRule
status.officeNotAvailableClear: Office.js not available - cannot clear cell
status.officeNotAvailableImport: Office.js not available - cannot import RRule

officeWarning.openFromExcel: Open this page from within the Excel add-in to insert RRules.

status.notesColumnNotFound: Notes column not found in worksheet
status.selectDataRow: Select a data row to edit notes
status.noNotesFound: No notes found in selected row
status.officeNotAvailable: Office.js not available - running in preview mode
status.officeNotAvailableSave: Office.js not available - cannot save notes

officeWarning.notAvailableMessage: Office.js not available. Open this page from within the Excel add-in to edit notes.

comingSoon.heading: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.subheading: Thank you for your interest in Excelendar
comingSoon.description: Excelendar is a powerful calendar management tool that brings your Microsoft 365 calendar into a familiar spreadsheet-like interface.
comingSoon.excelFeature1: üìä Edit calendar events in Excel's familiar grid interface
comingSoon.excelFeature2: üîÑ Bulk create, update, and delete events with ease
comingSoon.excelFeature3: üåç Full timezone support for global teams
comingSoon.pwaFeature1: üåê Access your calendar from any browser
comingSoon.pwaFeature2: üì± Works offline as a Progressive Web App
comingSoon.betaMessage: We're currently in private beta. Public access will be available soon!
comingSoon.contactFooter: Want early access? Contact us at

installPrompt.title: Install Excelendar App
installPrompt.description: Get the best experience by installing Excelendar as a standalone app on your device.
installPrompt.feature1: Launch directly from your home screen or taskbar
installPrompt.feature2: Native app experience without App Store downloads
installPrompt.feature3: Fast and lightweight - no browser tabs needed

installInstructions.title: How to Install
installInstructions.screenReaderDescription: Instructions for installing Excelendar as a progressive web app on your device.
installInstructions.noteText: After installing, you can launch Excelendar directly from your device like any other app.

ios.title: Install on iOS Safari
ios.step1: Tap the Share button (square with arrow) at the bottom of the screen
ios.step2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
ios.step3: Tap "Add" in the top right corner
ios.step4: The Excelendar app will appear on your home screen

chrome.title: Install on Chrome
chrome.step1: Click the menu icon (three dots) in the top right corner
chrome.step2: Look for "Install Excelendar" in the menu
chrome.step4: The app will open in its own window

edge.title: Install on Edge
edge.step1: Click the menu icon (three dots) in the top right corner
edge.step3: Click "Install this site as an app"
edge.step4: The app will open in its own window

safari.title: Install on Safari (macOS)
safari.step1: Safari does not support PWA installation on macOS
safari.step2: For the best experience, please use Chrome or Edge
safari.step3: Or add this page to your bookmarks for quick access

firefox.title: Install on Firefox
firefox.step2: For the best experience, please use Chrome or Edge
firefox.step3: Or bookmark this page for quick access

generic.title: Install Excelendar
generic.step1: Your browser may not support app installation
generic.step2: For the best experience, use Chrome or Edge
generic.step3: You can bookmark this page for quick access

settings.title: Settings
settings.screenReaderDescription: Configure calendar settings including editing mode, theme, date/time format, visible columns, and column order. Use Tab to navigate, Escape to close.

editingMode.title: Editing Mode
editingMode.description: Local mode shows times in your local timezone. Event mode shows times in the event's original timezone.

confirmBeforeExport.label: Confirm before Export
confirmBeforeExport.description: Show a confirmation dialog with change summary before exporting to calendar

warnAttendeeNotifications.label: Warn about Attendee Notifications
warnAttendeeNotifications.description: Show a warning when editing or deleting events with attendees who will receive notification emails

showTzColumns.label: Show timezone columns (Start TZ, End TZ)

visibleColumns.title: Visible Columns
visibleColumns.description: Choose which optional columns to display in the grid.

columnOrder.title: Column Order & Freeze Position
columnOrder.description: Drag columns to reorder them (or use the up/down arrows). The "FROZEN" divider shows which columns stay visible when scrolling horizontally.
columnOrder.moveDividerUp: Move frozen divider up (freeze fewer columns)
columnOrder.moveDividerDown: Move frozen divider down (freeze more columns)

filters.title: Advanced Filters
filters.screenReaderDescription: Filter calendar events by date range, time, duration, day of week, recurrence type, attendees, categories, and more. Use Tab to navigate, Escape to close.

notesEditor.title: Edit Event Notes
notesEditor.screenReaderDescription: Rich text editor for event notes. Use the toolbar to format text with bold, italic, colors, lists, and alignment. Toggle between WYSIWYG and HTML source view. Use Tab to navigate, Escape to close.

findReplace.title: Find & Replace
findReplace.regexFlagsHelp: Common: g=global, i=case-insensitive, m=multiline, u=unicode, s=dotAll
findReplace.backreferencesHelp: Use $1, $2, etc. to reference capture groups from your regex pattern
findReplace.wildcardHelp: Tip: Use * to match entire field content
findReplace.wildcardHelpShort: use * to match entire field content
findReplace.screenReaderDescription: Search and replace text across calendar events. Configure search mode, fields to search, and scope. Use Tab to navigate, Escape to close.

findDuplicates.title: Find Duplicates
findDuplicates.screenReaderDescription: Find and mark duplicate calendar events for deletion based on matching field criteria.
findDuplicates.fieldsLabel: Check these fields to identify duplicates:
findDuplicates.warningMessage: Deleting duplicate events with guests may trigger email notifications to attendees.
findDuplicates.previewMessage: {count} duplicate event(s) found. Recurring series occurrences will be kept over single instances. Otherwise, the earliest event in each group will be kept.

setProperties.title: Set Properties
setProperties.screenReaderDescription: Bulk edit properties for multiple calendar events including status, privacy, categories, and guests.
setProperties.guestsPlaceholder: Enter email addresses, separated by commas
setProperties.warningAddGuests: Adding attendees will send invitation emails to all guests when you export these events.
setProperties.warningRemoveGuests: Removing attendees will send cancellation emails to specified guests when you export these events.
setProperties.warningRemoveAllGuests: Removing all attendees will send cancellation emails to all guests when you export these events.

ui.welcomeDescription: Sign in with your Microsoft account to manage your calendar events
ui.noChanges: No events marked for update, delete, or create
ui.emptyStateDescription: Select a calendar and click Import to load events
ui.emptyStateTip: üí° Tip: Use the Import button to get started
ui.emptyStateDisclaimer: Excelendar is not responsible for any data loss resulting from the use of Excelendar Web App.
ui.statusAddedEvent: Added new event - edit and export to save
ui.statusEnterBothDates: Please enter both start and end dates
ui.statusCannotExportInvalid: Cannot export: {count} event(s) have missing required fields
ui.logVisitToSubscribe: Visit excelendar.com to subscribe and create an account
ui.logSubscriptionRequired: A subscription is required to use import/export features
ui.validationStartAfterEnd: Start time cannot be after end time (Start: {start}, End: {end})
ui.logPermissionDenied: Permission denied - Calendar may be read-only: {error}
ui.logFailedToConvertRRule: Failed to convert RRULE to Graph format for event: {subject}
ui.logFailedToParseRecurrence: Failed to parse recurrence data for event: {subject}
ui.logEventsSkippedValidation: {count} events skipped due to validation errors
ui.logResetView: Reset view - cleared row highlights (preserved deleted events)

customRange.helpText: Events will be imported with recurring instances expanded.

copyMove.screenReaderDescription: Copy or move events to another calendar with optional date shifting and repeat.
copyMove.title: Copy / Move {count} Event(s)
copyMove.repeatHint: Repeat this operation multiple times with incremental offsets
copyMove.repeatPreview: Creates {count} total copies with {interval} {unit} between each
copyMove.guestWarning: Keeping guests will trigger email notifications to all attendees

exportConfirmation.title: Confirm Export
exportConfirmation.description: You are about to make the following changes to your calendar:

rruleEditor.screenReaderDescription: Edit event recurrence pattern. Configure frequency, interval, days of week, and end conditions. Use Tab to navigate, Escape to close.
rruleEditor.incompletePatternMessage: Please complete all required fields. For example, if you selected "On" for the end date, you must choose a specific date from the picker.
rruleEditor.advancedPatternMessage: This RRule contains advanced features that cannot be edited using the visual controls. You can still save it, or edit the raw RRule string above to create a simpler pattern.

logs.title: Activity Logs
logs.description: View and filter activity logs for errors, warnings, success, and information messages.
logs.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?

readOnlyCalendar.title: Read-Only Calendar
readOnlyCalendar.cannotExport: Cannot export changes to this calendar.
readOnlyCalendar.cannotAdd: Cannot add events to this calendar.
readOnlyCalendar.noPermissionExport: The selected calendar is read-only. You don't have permission to create, update, or delete events in this calendar.
readOnlyCalendar.noPermissionCreate: The selected calendar is read-only. You don't have permission to create events in this calendar.
readOnlyCalendar.ownedBy: This calendar is owned by {owner}. Please select a calendar where you have edit permissions.
readOnlyCalendar.selectEditableCalendar: Please select a calendar where you have edit permissions.

welcome.title: Welcome to Excelendar
welcome.signInPrompt: Please sign in with your Microsoft account to access your portal, view your subscription details, and review your sync history.
welcome.accountTypes: Works with both personal and work/school accounts

processing.title: Processing Your Subscription
processing.settingUp: Setting up your account. This usually takes just a few seconds.
processing.message: Your subscription is being set up. This usually takes a few moments, but can occasionally take up to 2 minutes.
processing.contactSupport: If the issue persists after refreshing, please contact support.

license.title: License Status
license.expired: Your license has expired. Renew your subscription to continue.
license.suspended: Your license is suspended. Contact support or renew your subscription.
license.cancelled: Your license has been cancelled. Purchase a new subscription to continue.
license.trialEndedMessage: Your trial has ended. Subscribe now to continue using Excelendar.
license.statusMessage: Your subscription is {status}. Please update your payment method or renew your subscription.
license.purchasePrompt: Purchase a subscription to access all Excelendar features

usage.title: Usage Statistics (Last 30 Days)
usage.startUsing: Start using Excelendar to see your activity statistics

activity.activityWillAppear: Your import and export operations will appear here
activity.sheetPlaceholder: Enter the name of the Excel worksheet
activity.noSheetActivity: No activity found for this sheet ID
activity.checkSheetId: Check that the ID is correct and activity has been logged for this sheet
activity.enterSheetPrompt: Enter a sheet name to view its activity
activity.sheetActivityDescription: See all operations performed by anyone in your organization on a specific worksheet
activity.errorsWillAppear: Errors from your import and export operations will appear here

privacy.title: Privacy & Marketing
privacy.marketingDescription: Receive emails about special deals, new features, and updates from Excelendar

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.confirmDeleteActivity: Are you sure you want to delete all {count} activity logs? This action cannot be undone.
dataManagement.confirmDeleteErrors: Are you sure you want to delete all {count} error logs? This action cannot be undone.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data including activity logs, error logs, and license information. Your subscription (if any) will remain with your organization and will not be deleted.
dangerZone.deleteInfo: You can create a new account at any time by signing in again with your Microsoft account and a valid Excelendar license.
dangerZone.typeDelete: Type DELETE to confirm account deletion
dangerZone.confirmDelete: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. Are you absolutely sure?
dangerZone.typeDeleteError: Please type DELETE to confirm account deletion
